m_szDocTitle: Toyota Offering Incentives up to $7,500 for RAV4 EV
m_szDocSumamry: Toyota Offering Incentives Up To $7,500 For RAV4 EV December 28th, 2012 by Nicholas Brown     It seems as if every time a new EV is released, it trounces its predecessors. The RAV4 EV accelerates from zero to sixty miles per hour in 7 seconds, can travel 103 miles per charge, and gets 76 miles per gallon equivalency. SUVs normally cannot achieve such a combination of qualities. Especially not such high efficiency and decent performance. Toyota is now offering the 2012 RAV4 EV for $49,800. However, it is also offering incentives such as $5,000 cash back and $2,500 in loyalty cash, which appears
